constructorProps.name: value
constructorProps.description:
The value for the Toggle.

When passing a getter, it will be used as source of truth,
meaning that the value only changes when the getter returns a new value.

Otherwise, if passing a static value, it'll serve as the default value.

constructorProps.name: onValueChange
constructorProps.description: Called when the value is supposed to change.

constructorProps.name: disabled
constructorProps.description: If `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the input.

properties.name: trigger
properties.description: The trigger that toggles the value.

properties.name: hiddenInput
properties.description: A hidden input field to use within forms.

constructorProps.name: selectWhenFocused
constructorProps.description: If `true`, the value will be changed whenever a trigger is focused.

constructorProps.name: loop
constructorProps.description: If the the trigger selection should loop when navigating with the arrow keys.

constructorProps.name: orientation
constructorProps.description: The orientation of the tabs.

constructorProps.name: value
constructorProps.description:
The default value for `tabs.value`

When passing a getter, it will be used as source of truth,
meaning that `tabs.value` only changes when the getter returns a new value.

If omitted, it will use the first tab as default.

constructorProps.name: onValueChange
constructorProps.description: Called when the `Tabs` instance tries to change the active tab.

methods.name: getTrigger
methods.type:
(value: T) => {
  readonly "data-melt-trigger": T
  readonly "data-active": "" | undefined
  readonly tabindex: 0 | -1
  readonly role: "tab"
  readonly "aria-selected": boolean
  readonly "aria-controls": string
  readonly "data-orientation": "horizontal" | "vertical"
  readonly onclick: () => T
  readonly onkeydown: (e: KeyboardEvent) => void
  readonly id: string
}
methods.description: Gets the attributes and listeners for a tab trigger. Requires an identifying tab value.

methods.name: getContent
methods.type:
(value: T) => {
  readonly "data-melt-content": ""
  readonly hidden: boolean
  readonly "data-active": "" | undefined
  readonly role: "tabpanel"
  readonly id: string
  readonly "aria-labelledby": string
  readonly "data-orientation": "horizontal" | "vertical"
}
methods.description: Gets the attributes and listeners for the tabs contents. Requires an identifying tab value.

properties.name: triggerList
properties.description: The attributes for the list that contains the tab triggers.

constructorProps.name: min
constructorProps.description: The minimum value of the slider.

constructorProps.name: max
constructorProps.description: The maximum value of the slider.

constructorProps.name: orientation
constructorProps.description: The orientation of the slider.

constructorProps.name: step
constructorProps.description: The step size of the slider.

constructorProps.name: value
constructorProps.description:
The default value for `tabs.value`

When passing a getter, it will be used as source of truth,
meaning that `tabs.value` only changes when the getter returns a new value.

If omitted, it will use the first tab as default.

constructorProps.name: onValueChange
constructorProps.description: Called when the `Slider` instance tries to change the active tab.

properties.name: root
properties.type:
{
  readonly "data-dragging": "" | undefined
  readonly "data-value": number
  readonly "data-orientation": "horizontal" | "vertical"
  readonly "data-melt-root": ""
  readonly "aria-valuenow": number
  readonly "aria-valuemin": number
  readonly "aria-valuemax": number
  readonly "aria-orientation": "horizontal" | "vertical"
  readonly id: string
  readonly style: string
  readonly tabindex: 0
  readonly role: "slider"
  readonly onmousedown: (e: MouseEvent) => void
  readonly onkeydown: (e: KeyboardEvent) => void
}
properties.description:
The root of the slider.
Any cursor interaction along this element will change the slider's values.

properties.name: track
properties.description: The track in which the thumb and range sit upon.

properties.name: range
properties.description: The range indicating the slider's value.

properties.name: thumb
properties.description: The slider's thumb, positioned at the end of the range.

constructorProps.name: open
constructorProps.description:
If the Popover is open.

When passing a getter, it will be used as source of truth,
meaning that the value only changes when the getter returns a new value.

Otherwise, if passing a static value, it'll serve as the default value.

constructorProps.name: onOpenChange
constructorProps.description: Called when the value is supposed to change.

constructorProps.name: forceVisible
constructorProps.description: If the popover visibility should be controlled by the user.

properties.name: trigger
properties.description: The trigger that toggles the value.

properties.name: content

constructorProps.name: value
constructorProps.description:
The value for the Pin Input.

When passing a getter, it will be used as source of truth,
meaning that the value only changes when the getter returns a new value.

Otherwise, if passing a static value, it'll serve as the default value.

constructorProps.name: onValueChange
constructorProps.description: Called when the `PinInput` instance tries to change the value.

constructorProps.name: maxLength
constructorProps.description: The amount of digits in the Pin Input.

constructorProps.name: placeholder
constructorProps.description: An optional placeholder to display when the input is empty.

constructorProps.name: disabled
constructorProps.description: If `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the input.

constructorProps.name: mask
constructorProps.description: If the input should be masked like a password.

constructorProps.name: type
constructorProps.description: What characters the input accepts.

properties.name: root
inputs
properties.type:
{
  readonly "data-melt-input": ""
  readonly placeholder: string | undefined
  readonly disabled: true | undefined
  readonly type: "text" | "password"
  readonly "data-filled": "" | undefined
  readonly tabindex: 0 | -1
  readonly style: "caret-color: transparent;" | undefined
  readonly onkeydown: (e: KeyboardEvent) => void
  readonly onpointerdown: (e: Event) => void
  readonly onpointerup: (e: Event) => void
  readonly oninput: (e: Event) => void
  readonly onfocus: () => void
  readonly onblur: () => void
}[]
properties.description: An array of props that should be spread to the input elements.
